subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: If the Giants make it deep into the playoffs, credit has to go to the players and the coaches but also to Jerry Reese, the team’s unobtrusive first-year general manger.
snippet: If the Giants make it deep into the playoffs, credit has to go to the players and the coaches but also to Jerry Reese, the team’s unobtrusive first-year general manger.
